about_the_game:
Beat zombies hard at three different unique map,driving three unique vehicles.

Can drive three kind of vehicles.
Truck -- high mobility and agile.
Armored Vehicle -- bigger firepower ,deploy auto gun to build defend line.
Tank -- ranged damage ,precision strike.

Multiple upgrade options

Grenade -- classic weapon.
Rocket -- use with skill.
Firegrenade -- something burnt.
Missile -- precision strike.
... and more

Realistic mix arcade style driving experience, quick shoot gameplay , caution , driving safety first.

Need a break ? Unlimit range of landscape give you an oppurtunity to run and take advantage point to fight.

welcome to join QQ group ：308542190 chat

name: Vehicle Beat Zombie Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: AMD R5, Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrate
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: AMD R5, Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrate

short_description: Zombie incoming,fortunately,we got plenty of vehicle to use,armed with multiple weapons,avoid attacked by zombie by driving vehicles,open landscape give you advantage to take vantage point,use weapons to hit them,grenades ,firegrenade are handy,you can upgrade weapons to gain more chance to win.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
